map.error.title: An error has ocurred...
map.warning.title: Warning
map.error.locale: The required interface language for this map is not available. Please change the required language and try again.
map.error.crs: A valid coordinate reference system is not found. Please add one and try again.
map.error.initialExtent: No valid initial extent has been defined for this map. Please add one and try again.
map.error.baseLayers: There are no layers defined as background. Please add at least one base layer and try again.
map.error.layerCatalog: The available layer catalog is empty. Please add at least one layer and try again.
map.error.badConfigTree: Some of the layer catalogs in this application are not configured correctly and have been omitted from the map. Please check the app settings.
